# 搭建一个React Component Library

Part1 --- The library itself and local development setup

Part2 --- Testing the components

  • 1. 技术栈
  • 2. 开始
    • 2.1 安装依赖
    • 2.2 创建组件
    • 2.3 添加样式
    • 2.4 添加全局样式
  • 3. 测试组件
    • 3.1 基本测试
    • 3.2 组件交互
    • 3.3 测试样式

# 1. 技术栈

  • Emotion
    • CSS-in-JS library
    • Emotion Doc
  • Styleguidist
    • 相关StoryBook
  • Jest/Testing Library
    • Testing Library
  • Rollup/Babel
  • Travis CI

# 2. 开始

mkdir react-sample-components-library
cd react-sample-components-library
npm init -y

# 2.1 安装依赖

npm install --save-dev react react-dom @emotion/core @emotion/styled

使用 Styleguidist 来动态开发组件

npm install --save-dev react-styleguidist webpack

安装Babel

npm install --save-dev babel-loader @babel/core @babel/preset-env @babel/preset-react

新建Babel配置文件.babelrc

// .babelrc
{
  "presets": ["@babel/preset-env", "@babel/preset-react"]
}

创建styleguide.config.js来设置Styleguidist内置webpack实例，这样就可以使用我们自己的 Babel 配置了。

// styleguide.config.js
module.exports = {
  webpackConfig: {
    module: {
      rules: [
        {
          test: /\.jsx?$/,
          exclude: /node_modules/,
          loader: "babel-loader"
        }
      ]
    }
  },
};

给package.json增加一个script

"start": "styleguidist server"

运行

npm start

# 2.2 创建组件

+-- src
|		+-- components
|				+-- Button.js

先创建一个简单的Button组件

// src/components/Button.js
import React from "react";

export default function Button({ text }) {
  return <button>{text}</button>;
}

启动组件

npm start

现在还没有任何东西。Styleguidist让组件预览和描述一个组件变得更加方便。

在Button.js文件的同层级下增加一个新的文件Button.md

A very simple button

​```jsx
import Button from './Button';

<Button text="We Salute You!"/>

# 2.3 添加样式

npm install --save-dev babel-plugin-emotion

.babelrc中新增

{
  //...
  "plugins": ["emotion"]
}

// src/components/Button.js
import React from "react";
import styled from "@emotion/styled";

const Wrapper = styled.button`
  text-transform: uppercase;
  font-size: 1.5em;
  font-weight: bold;
  letter-spacing: 4px;
  background: #5cdb95;
  color: #05385b;
  border: none;
  border-radius: 5px;
  padding: 10px 20px;
`;

export default function Button({ text }) {
  return <Wrapper>{text}</Wrapper>;
}

# 2.4 添加全局样式

// src/config/styles.js

import { css } from "@emotion/core";

export const font = css`
  text-transform: uppercase;
  font-size: 1.5em;
  font-weight: bold;
  letter-spacing: 4px;
`;

export const shape = css`
  border: none;
  border-radius: 5px;
  padding: 10px 20px;
`;

export const primaryColors = css`
  background: #5cdb95;
  color: #05385b;
`;

在Button.js中使用全局样式

// src/components/Button.js

import React from "react";
import styled from "@emotion/styled";
import { font, primaryColors, shape } from "../config/styles";

const Wrapper = styled.button`
  ${font}
  ${primaryColors}
  ${shape}
`;

export default function Button({ text }) {
  return <Wrapper>{text}</Wrapper>;
}

# 2.4.1 将全局样式中的相对引用变成绝对引用

npm install babel-plugin-module-resolver --save-dev

修改.babelrc

{
  "presets": ["@babel/preset-env", "@babel/preset-react"],
  "plugins": [["module-resolver", { "root": ["./src"] }]]
}

修改src/components/Button.js

// src/components/Button.js

import React from "react";
import styled from "@emotion/styled";
import { font, primaryColors, shape } from "config/styles";

const Wrapper = styled.button`
  ${font}; ${primaryColors}; ${shape};
`;

export default function Button({ text }) {
  return <Wrapper>{text}</Wrapper>;
}

# 3. 测试组件

我们使用Jest和React Testing Library来测试React组件

npm install --save-dev @testing-library/react jest

在package.json添加一个新的命令

{
  //...
  "scripts": {
    // ...
    "test": "jest"
  }
}

# 3.1 基本测试

// src/components/Button.test.js
import { render, getByText } from "@testing-library/react";
import React from "react";
import Button from "components/Button";

describe("Button", () => {
  test("should display text", () => {
    const { container } = render(<Button text="We Salute You!" />);

    getByText(container, "We Salute You!");
  });
});

# 3.2 组件交互

// src/component/Button.test.js
import { render, getByText } from "@testing-library/react";
import React from "react";
import Button from "components/Button";

describe("Button", () => {
  test("should display text", () => {
    const { container } = render(<Button text="We Salute You!" />);

    getByText(container, "We Salute You!");
  });

  test("should handle click events", () => {
    const onClickMock = jest.fn();
    const { container } = render(
      <Button text="Click me, maybe?" onClick={onClickMock} />
    );
    const component = container.firstChild;

    fireEvent.click(component);
    expect(onClickMock).toBeCalled();
  });
});

// src/component/Button.js

// ...
export default function Button({ text, onClick }) {
  return <Wrapper onClick={onClick}>{text}</Wrapper>;
}

执行npm run test后

# 3.3 测试样式

使用jest-emotion

npm install --save-dev jest-emotion

// src/setupTests.js
import { matchers } from "jest-emotion";
expect.extend(matchers);

// jest.config.js
module.exports = {
  setupFilesAfterEnv: ["./src/setupTests.js"]
};

配置好Jest以后，新增一个button test

test("should make text uppercase", () => {
  const { container } = render(<Button text="We Salute You!" />);
  const component = getByText(container, "We Salute You!");

  expect(component).toHaveStyleRule("text-transform", "uppercase");
});
